name: Turbo Fuse 110 M VI, USP Class VI
description: Turbo Fuse 110 M VI, USP Class VI medical devices approved advanced formula is designed to polymerize instantly by absorbing surface moisture. The product's performance has been tested with a variety of materials, and is recommended for a multitude of applications. The fast curing qualities make it especially desirable in high speed industrial production. Turbo Fuse 110 medical devices approvedis ideal for use in applications that require an easily handled high viscosity adhesive approved for use on medical devices.
